Question: In 1985, this person was rushed to the emergency room, suffering with polycythemia, after years of heavy smoking.
Hints: This person "survived" his containment to help O'Brien present the Emmy Award for Best Comedy Series (which went to The Office).
Transcripts of many of this person's classic routines are woven in with the rest of the text.
George than a choirboy, this person has wounded, if not slain, many of the dragons that stalk our society.
